name: hejunjie/utils
description: 一个零碎但实用的 PHP 工具函数集合库。包含文件、字符串、数组、网络请求等常用函数的工具类集合，提升开发效率，适用于日常 PHP 项目辅助功能 | A lightweight and practical PHP utility library that offers a collection of commonly used helper functions for files, strings, arrays, and HTTP requests—designed to streamline development and support everyday PHP projects.
